layoutRecommendations: Ensure all collection cards have consistent height for better visual alignment
Reduce padding on section 2 to improve content density
Reduce vertical spacing to show more cards above the fold
flowImprovements: Add clear call-to-action buttons on state cards
Add search/filter functionality to help users find specific locations
Add category filters or grouping for easier navigation with many collections
Add clear instructions or helper text to guide users
Consider adding a back button for easier navigation
priorityFixes: 1. Fix "No collections found" empty state - ensure API returns fallback data
2. Reduce hero section height to show more content above the fold
3. Improve mobile responsiveness - stack cards vertically on small screens
4. Add search/filter functionality to collection pages
5. Enhance breadcrumb navigation with complete trail
6. Fix contrast issues with gray text on dark backgrounds
7. Add loading states that resolve properly
8. Implement proper error handling with user-friendly messages
